attributes.action: build mor parks and youth centres
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i wish to complain about the lack of parks, skate parks and youth centres within Kingston-upon-Hull and wish to patition for the government to provide funding to the Hull City council to build areas for teenagers to go. within the past year I have been asked by police officers to leave areas for the simple fact that I'm a teenager and can be seen as a little intimidating. I find it wrong that they ask us t mov when we can't.
